thread.title: Family few days in the capital
thread.title_full: Family few days in the capital - Review of Premier Inn London Archway, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Joanne H
title: Family few days in the capital
text:
We stayed here for a half term break. The hotel is a minute from the tube and was very clean and comfortable. The staff were very friendly and the facilities excellent. The area its self was a little bit disappointing, we would perhaps stay in a different area next time.
Room Tip: Good location for tube See more room tips
